page.description: The UI_BITMAP_CREATE_FROM_XPM() function creates a bitmap in XPM format, which supports Alpha Anywhere named colors.

discussion.syntax: Result_Flag as L = UI_BITMAP_CREATE_FROM_XPM(C name,C xpm_format)

argument.name: name
argument.description: The name of the bitmap to create.

section.title: Example
section.description: The function makes it easy to create a named bitmap from an XPM format, which is a pixel map. This example uses a 4 color palette because transparency doesn't work in a 2 color palette.
section.example:
ui_bitmap_create_from_xpm("xpm",<<%str% 9 9 4 1 R c Red . c X c - c ......... .RRRRRRR. .RR...RR. .R.R.R.R. .R..R..R. .R.R.R.R. .RR...RR. .RRRRRRR. ......... %str%)
ui_dlg_box("XPM",<<%dlg% {image=xpm} %dlg%)
